agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Intergovernmental Relations TIME & DATE: 9:30 AM, Monday, April 8, 2019 PLACE: E1.028 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Eddie Lucio, Jr. The Senate Committee on Intergovernmental Relations will meet to consider the following: SB 253 Rodríguez Relating to expedited proceedings in cases involving dangerously damaged or deteriorated or substandard buildings or improvements in a municipality. SB 335 West Relating to community land trusts. SB 493 Alvarado Relating to the allocation of housing tax credits to developments within proximate geographical areas. SB 542 Watson Relating to the allocation of housing tax credits to developments within proximate geographical areas. SB 544 Watson Relating to the administration of federal funds under the Cranston-Gonzalez National Affordable Housing Act. SB 746 Campbell | et al. Relating to certain procedures associated with voter approval of municipal annexation. SB 1000 Watson Relating to the municipal regulation of housing for homeless individuals provided by a religious organization. SB 1115 Lucio Relating to the authority of a county to adopt a land bank program. SB 1117 Lucio Relating to the authority of a municipality to adopt a land bank program. SB 1129 West Relating to the operation of certain urban land bank demonstration programs. SB 1132 West Relating to the authority of certain municipalities to annex an enclave. SB 1196 Miles Relating to automatic employee participation in and administration of a deferred compensation plan provided by certain hospital districts. SB 1861 Menéndez Relating to certain public facilities financed, owned, and operated by a public facility corporation. SB 1918 Alvarado Relating to the creation of an urban land bank by certain municipalities; granting authority to issue bonds. SB 1950 Seliger Relating to the Donley County Hospital District. SB 2022 Miles | et al. Relating to the creation and operations of health care provider participation programs in Harris County Hospital District. SB 2194 Lucio Relating to the municipal hotel occupancy tax. SB 2212 Taylor Relating to the maintenance and operation of certain projects by certain drainage districts. SB 2315 Hinojosa Relating to the creation and operations of a health care provider participation program by the Nueces County Hospital District. SB 2448 Perry Relating to the creation and operations of a health care provider participation program by the Lubbock County Hospital District. SB 2506 Creighton Relating to the powers and authorities of municipal utility districts. The Committee may also consider the following pending business: SB 1474 Lucio Relating to private activity bonds allocated for affordable housing. For members of the public who wish to provide oral testimony, please limit prepared remarks to three (3) minutes. If providing written testimony, please submit twenty (20) copies, with your name on each copy, to the Committee during the hearing. Copies will be distributed to Committee Members and will be part of our public record. Bills added after last posting: SB 2194 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
